Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review:
I got this product about a month ago looking for a cheaper alternative to the iPad. I needed something I could open word and PDF files on the go without having to reformat for my Kindle. It also needed to be able to have a Kindle app as well as other ereader capabilities. So far I don't have a single complaint about the use of this product. The screen is smaller than an iPad but it allows for changes in backlighting to suit my needs throughout the day and it's touch screen is sensitive enough that I don't need a stylus but not so sensitive it's always opening and closing my programs. The battery life could be better. I don't get as much runtime on it as I'd like but thankfully it charges pretty fast.
Battery Life
As mentioned the battery is poor. I can read a full book on the ... Kindle App but usually need to plug it in afterward.
Support & Service
I've not needed support on this product as of yet.
Speed/Performance
The Wi-fi is slow to connect and sometimes the pages take a while to load but it's still faster than my 3G cell phone.
Design
This tablet is small but has a pretty decent weight to it. I'm glad I don't feel like I'm going to break the thing when holding it. The volume button on the side can get in the way but overall I'm pleased.
Durability
I've already dropped it off my couch twice and it's still running just fine. expand » « collapse
Item.HelpfulCount: 3 out of 3 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: not a bad little toy for the price
Item.Review: The primary reason I ordered this product was for a less expensive e-reader from I pad or Kindle. The size and screen are excellent for reading. The battery life is kind of short and I had to mod the thing as the Android OS is pretty limited. As with any e-reader you'll have to play with it a little to get certain books you've downloaded to work. The wifi and internet feature is a nice bonus and it plays videos from most formats very clear. All in all a nice toy for the price.
Item.HelpfulCount: 5 out of 6 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review:
Pros: Touch screen,market, size
Cons: NOTHING!
I just bought thins and its good for its price at least. th etouch screen is great and the browser is good and easy to use. GOOD BUY< BEST BUY

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: Good value - wish Flash worked though
Item.Review: I bought this Kyros for my 9 year old's birthday. I don't have an iPad or anything like that and I wasn't sure if my son would get much use out of it so I didn't want to spend a lot of money. This one was very affordable. It connected up quickly to our wireless internet and I was able to quickly download some apps and games I thought he would like. I downloaded a bunch of songs and set up his Gmail account all very easily. The performance is pretty good. The screen responded to the stylus pretty good but sometimes it was a little touchy when trying to 'move' to the next page as it would actually open or execute the item where you started to drag across the screen. The biggest disappointment I had is that I was not able to open up his online gaming sites (ie: Wizard101) and Hulu be ... cause they required Flash. The speakers aren't real loud so you're best to have headphones if listening to music. Overall, I would recommend it for an entry level tablet. My son likes that he can pull up YouTube videos, his email and music without going to the computer room. expand » « collapse
Item.HelpfulCount: 4 out of 4 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: I bought this as part of an R&D research process. I was curious as to what/how a low cost 7 tablet might work. First of all, it works if you are using Google's AppInventor and for other development tasks. Its not the world's fastest droid device, but it does have the full droid OS on it, and so can be used as such. I have little experience with it on a daily use - but, it seems like it surfs OK and does the e-reader thing fine. The battery life is a bit lacking, but if I remember to charge it every night, its fine. Finally, the touch screen is a little particular, but at least it has a stylus which is a plus in my book! Overall, for the cost, its a functional, albeit sluggish, tablet.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: I really just wanted a cheap reader with a decent color screen (to read in dim light). You get that and a lot more with this thing. Welcome to Android! If reading gets tiresome, there's the internet (with the huge amount of free Android programs), email, movies and music, galore (use up to a 16gb micro SDHC card to get full enjoyment). Can't wait to try out the HD video on my HDTV (need a C to A HDMI cable, and probably a Toslink to optical for sound to my receiver). I can easily see how DVDs are becoming obsolete.. Only gave it 4 stars because of the battery (think hours, not days..) When leaving Hi-Fi off and the screen not-so-bright, you'll get 7 hrs easy.
Item.HelpfulCount: 3 out of 4 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: This is an alternative to carrying my laptop. I will use it mainly to access the net and email. It fits in the inside pocket of my daypack. The screen is bright and a good size. I'm just getting the hang of it, but it seems ok. Battery life is not long--less than 3 hrs? Email loads slowly and some websites seem incompatible with android. But I think it will serve my purposes.
Item.HelpfulCount: 2 out of 2 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: If you are looking for a entry level tablet this is the one for you. slim design, great screen display, expandable memory, and simple to use. I wish they put a better speaker in it.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: Pretty decent product for the price. Easy to root and still has some active rom development. Touch screen is capacitative but actually responds pretty well. Plays movies & videos pretty well. Wifi works great and browsing is pretty quick.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: I rated this five stars based on the combination of its price and features. This is an excellent tablet for the cost. If your looking for something to compare to an ipad your not going to find it in this tablet but your also not going to find the ipad price tag attached to this either. It is incredible for internet surfing, videos, email, music, pictures and apps if you root it. What else do you need really? For the price I couldn't be happier. I travel frequently and this is just perfect to bring with me to look things up and email while away without having the bulkiness of my laptop. Highly recommended. [...]
Item.HelpfulCount: 3 out of 3 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: This is a good beginner tablet for those who are not ready for a pricey tablet. This is easy to navigate if you have had any exposure to a touch screen phone- no need for tutorials just tap and go. The quality of the backlight for reading is very good. The bookmarking process for downloaded books is simple and not a multi step process. There is no camera on this device, but for internet surfing, e-mail, downloading books, podcasts, I would recommend this starter tablet. So far there have not been any glitches in this tablet. For the price it is a good way to begin learning this techonology, good for kids to experiment before investing in more costly tablets. Good for those who do not want all the "bells and whistles" like myself. ...

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: Very solid feel, decent looking display and good size...fit my hands perfectly. I purchased this low cost Android table to play around with rooting...so far it fits the bill perfectly. Not super fast response and the resistive touch display took a bit to get use to, but IMO it was money well spent. Even with the stock Kyros setup this would a good tablet for email, playing games and browsing the Internet. Root it, get Google Market, load some good apps and it's a great little tablet.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: It's a neat gadget, but don't get too excited. The body of the device is actually very sturdy: it looks more solid than I thought for this kind of device. It comes with a little faux-leather case that protects it even more. Touch screen uses resistive technology, and as expected, kind of crappy (resistive means NO double touch). It comes also with a small stylus that you took from one side of the device... but when I use the stylus I feel I'm back to Palm Pilot time... The things that makes this device a crappy device are: - slow slow slow. The CPU can't handle too many tasks at the same time. Perhaps is also a memory issue that cause the OS to keep reusing the memory from non-running applications, but it is kind of sluggish to use. It's so slow that the keyboard is very hard t ... o use. When you press (with the crappy resistive touch screen) you get the feedback way too late... - crash crash crash. Get familiar with the RESET button (on the back, you have to take it out of the case), because you are going to need it a lot. Learn also (to reduce crash) to turn it OFF every time instead of putting it on standby... you have better chance to have less crashes (boot time is reasonable on the other hand). I've noticed that most of the time, the device crash while in standby. Few things that can be improved (less critical): - battery usage. Don't expect the battery to last like a smartphone... at its best the batteries last for few hours of continuous usage. - App store missing. You can easily root it and install the Google Marketplace (and with it much more applications). There's an AppsLib store, but it list most of applications in chinese... Most of the ... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: Really cool coby kyros MID7015 Android Touchscreen Tablet PC
Item.Review:
Pros: Small and lightweight; all in one
This is actually a really cool tablet especially for people who want to carry around something thats small and not heavy! I do not own an IPad but I feel like this tablet is much easier to transport and just basically more economical. I have not had a problem with this tablet so far. I would say the memory and the price are fair for this product. I am a college student and it is actually really good for me to carry this around.. its lightweight and easy to transport and it is also small so it is not like this huge lap top you have to lug around and get in everyones way with. The apps are pretty cool on the tablet too. I am a big fan of android. I guess it depends on whether or not you like android or apple better. I would recommend testing it ... out before purchasing because you may like the ipad as a tablet better than the android tablet but in my oppionion this purchase was well worth the money spent. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: Coby Kyros is hands down the best android tablet!
Item.Review:
Pros: Small and lightweight; Economical compared to an iPad; all in one
I spent many hours playing with this great product. It has hundreds of awesome apps, great size, a great screen, never had any problems with it. This product would be perfect for people of all ages. You can really do just about everything you could do on a laptop on this great little device. It's got a great price, way better then the ipad. This product could be used as an educational tool. You can use it to write reports. it's also very durable, i've dropped it from small heights and it hasn't broken yet! i think that everyone should buy one of these! for the price you've got no reason not to! even though coby isn't a very big brand, i can tell that this product is deffinitely going to put them on the map and t ... hey'll be known for making good stuff. It's got everything you could possibley need. it doesn't have that much memory, but that's fine because the overall product is well worth the price. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: Originally purchased Pandigital tablet (for an Xmas present for mother-n-law) and expected very good and useful things but was sorely disappointed by its extremely poor battery life and general speed. On the way to return it, I happened upon the Kryos at Kmart. I immediately asked about the return policy and general questions regarding its use and operation. Young dude working there said they used it in the store a lot and the battery seemed pretty good. Purchased it after making sure I could return it and was extremely surprised at how well it worked and the life of the battery. It exceeded my expectations by far. I wanted to make sure it would be very usable for the MIL so I updated the Android, loaded apps, downloaded ebooks, and loaded movies and pics of the kids. The battery, while us ... ing the wifi nearly the entire time, is estimated at 4 hrs (not all at one sitting). I got 30 minutes from the Pandigital. Coby is known for cheap electronics but this is a winner. The price has not moved either since the beginning of December. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review:
Got the unit on sale. A decent deal for a Android tablet.
Pros: * large, bright, crisp screen * handy for web browsing and email reading (easy to setup) * firmware upgrade is quite trivial following the text version of the FAQ. * battery life is reasonable (3-4 hours of non-stop using). * works well as a colour reader (Aldiko).
Cons: * WIFI interface is quite amateurish - (1) I couldn't find the MAC address directly for setting up MAC filtering in my router; (2) For using router security feature of not broadcasting, the unit doesn't know how to connect. It appears that you must turn broadcasting on. * If you like to download more applications to enhance your experience, this is the most frustrating part. You need to use AppsLib to connect to the server wh ... ich was down 6 out of the past 7 days. I wonder how Google allows that to happen. * Default Slideshow (Gallery) comes with the unit only shows blurred pictures. You need to locate a useable one from Appslib (sigh..) expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: THESE ARE GREAT TIMES WE ARE LIVING IN WHEN GREAT INVENTIONS LIKE THIS TABLET BECOME AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC!!! IT'S EASY TO OPERATE IS EASY TO SETUP AND IS BUILT VERY WELL.. tHE ANDROID 2.1 SYSTEM ALLOWS YOU TO DOWNLOAD MANY...MANY HELPFUL APPLICATIONS. i PREFERRED ANOTHER E-READER PROGRAM THAN THE ONE THAT CAME WITH THE TABLET AND SIMPLY DOWNLOADED THE MOST POPULAR ONE! BATTERY LIFE IS OUTRAGEOUS EVEN WITH WIFI ON MOST OF THE TIME! I DOWNLOAD A BATTERY SAVER APP WHICH MADE IT EVEN BETTER!! THE PROCESSOR IS VERY FAST...THERE IS LITTLE WAITING DURING DOWNLOADS AND START-UPS...THE SCREEN IS BEAUTIFUL AND THE COLOR QUALITY FANTASTIC!! SCROLLING WAS THE ONLY PART THAT TOOK A BIT OF TIME TO MASTER. TOOK ME A DAY TO GET IT DOWN AND HAS BEEN A DREAM EVER SINCE!! GET ONE FOR YOURSELF OR TO KEEP T ... HE KIDS OFF YOUR LAPTOP, LIKE I DID!! LOL expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: I'm a young techie for the most part, but not a huge Apple fan, so I jumped at the opportunity to purchase an Internet tablet from a reputable company like Coby. So far it has exceeded my expectaions. There are plenty of Android apps, the Wi-Fi is fast, the touch screen is great, it is pretty easy to use and the size is perfect. I also bought one for my oldest nephew, who is in high school, for his Christmas present. I'd definitely recommend this purchase for anyone who wants a a mobile Internet pad on the go without having to carry around their laptop all day.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: Go 4 it! I love the Colby Kryros Touchscreet Android Tablet. The price can't be beat! I love being in access of the internet anytime of the day. It easily fits in my purse. Wonderful connectiion and super high speed without paying a fortune like some of the brand name competitors. You can upload photos; download music; it's an ereader also...what more could this techno society want?

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: I mainly use this to watch videos and play app games. Happy with the video picture. Hook it up to the web when im at home. going online to watch stuff and just surf is alittle annoying at times cause it hard to pin point small text with a finger or the web page takes forever to load. battery life is ok @ 2.5-3hrs of games, videos and surfing. but rechargeing takes about 5-6hrs for a full charge. a great started tab for those who dont wana spend the big bucks

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: I would not buy this product again
Item.Review: I bought two of the Kyros MID8024 tablets. One went out within 5 days of purchase and the other one only lasted about ten days. I am finding it difficult to find a telephone number or a return address so I can send them back to the manufacturer for repair or reimbursement.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: Good for : book, video, music, internet call (included MIC), android apps, web, media player on TV with HDMI (720/1080p) ! Would have been perfect if flash was supported at 100% for web, but web video is still possible with player apps. Also video at very very high bit rate in 1080 had problem (1 in so many), but it could had been my SD card, will retry one day with a better class 6 or 10 SD card. For the price the value is unbeatable and I've looked everywhere to find a better deal before buying this, very happy with it.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: Great little tablet for the money. Bought it for occasional use while away from my regular laptop. For the price, it does exactly what I need it to do... that being email and internet browsing. I also use it for Skype which works good on it. If you are a windows fan, it takes a little getting used to, but that is expected with using something for the first time. Highly recommend it for anyone who does not want to spend allot but still have access to the web via a tablet.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: Considering the low price, I was prepared to be underwhelmed with this thing. I was pleasantly surprised. I just wanted an ebook reader with internet. This definitely fits the bill. My husband likes it so much that he is going to order one for himself.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: Takes a little getting used to
Item.Review: I got this as a present to myself, because I had wanted a tablet for a while, but didn't want to shell out the money for an iPad. It's nice for what I payed for it, but you have to touch the screen just right or it will click when you don't want it to, or not scroll, or not respond. There is a stylus included, though I actually found it harder to use with the stylus than without. As for features, it's relatively easy to find apps that will extend the functionality. I've been using it primarily as an e-book reader and as a basic web browser, but will likely go beyond that and see what else I can do with it.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: I purchased the Kyros 7015 to use away from home as an e-reader, calendar and notes organizer, listen to music, etc., via wi-fi radio and mp3 filesand to play a few puzzle games. Pros: Good device to have along to prevent boredom! Wi-fi. Actual Android operating system (2.1) Memory expandable with micro SD slot. Touch screen actually works very well. The tablet comes loaded with a few good apps, and the apps library has quite a few free apps that are very useful. Price is very reasonable. (Why pay more for a tablet than a netbook?) Useful as an e-reader, productivity tool, entertainment tool, web browser. The tablet is lightweight and small enough to fit in my purse, but large enough to be useful. Comes with charger, usb cable for connecting to your computer, usb cable for connecting to ... usb flash drive, succint instruction manual and adequate website support for getting started and dealing with questions. Cons: The apps library has bugs, and the necessary(!) upgrade process is rather complicated (thus the 4-star rating). Once upgraded, the apps library still has one bug: each time it is opened the user is asked whether he/she wants to update. The answer is no, and then the apps lib works well. The apps library has a great many apps that are for smartphones with different Android operating systems, and that will not work on the Kyros, and there is no way to know the difference without loading and trying them. Adult content apps are not kept completely separate from others. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: I wish this product had better WIFI reception and had been compatible with Adobe Flash. My laptop has better WIFI. I bought the tablet because I wanted to listen to the radio on the internet, and I don't have radio reception at work. The radio station websites require Adobe Flash, and for some reason I couldn't receive a good WIFI signal at my desk.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review:
Pros: Best value in it's class
Cons: the same thing that plagues other brands... using the touh screen on the internet
First, this is the Coby Kyros MID7015, which BB fails to identify. Second, the device is, out-of-the-box, a pretty solid and capable little machine. Most reviews compare it to the iPad, so naturally it doesn't look that good against that. In it's price range however this is THE tablet of choice.
Resistive touchscreen is properly reactive, wi-fi is good, Youtube plays beautifully, and video loaded onto a micro-SD card plays crisp and responsive. The Kyros' sound system is impressive and ideal for close-quarters viewing (you would not watch from five feet away or more anyhow...). Despite other reviews claiming it would not handle them, my unit played AMV ... -formatted video comfortably. This means clips I formatted for an earlier MP4 media player will play on here and consume less space.
Additionally, my unit came with a snap-in "book" which protects it nicely and lends a nice faux leather look. The "book" also flips around and with the slide-thru clasp re-positioned becomes a stand for the Kyros.
Unlike some other Coby devices I have owned this one looks like it will last the long haul. Feels solid and plays beautifully. Coby may have finally found their niche. Just be sure to buy a micro SD card at the same time so you can load video.
Despite an impending new Android OS labelled "Honeycomb" I think this unit will meet my needs for a good while. Highly recommended. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: I did a little research on low cost tablets. I didn't want to spend the money on an IPAD for what I want to do. I looked at the Camdigital at around $220. I was about to get it. But I wanted something a little smaller and cheaper if possible. I looked at the Nook Color. Wasn't impressed. I found the Kyros on accident. I had never heard of it. I looked at the reviews on youtube. I like what was said. I love the price. On youtube I was able to find a tutorial to make the Kyros much better. My Kyros is just like my android phone. My kids and wife love it too. Gr8 4 the price. Does alot. ...

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: Cool tablet. Works as described, easy to use. Make sure you add an SD card for more memory. Even my IT guy at work was impressed. For an entry level, great priced tablet I would highly recommend.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: Bought this tablet as a birthday gift for my 3 year old. She was wearing out my droid phone wanting to play games so we got this inexpensive tablet for her. Even thought it only uses the AppLibs store and not the marketplace, all the apps she had on my phone were available. She loves it. The touch screen is just as good as my droid. Speed is a little slower and the 4 GB size would be small if you were storing a lot of pics or audio but as a tablet for games and surfing the web this is great. I work in IT and have a lot of gadgets. I would buy this for myself for a travel tablet in a heartbeat at this price.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: I did my research first so i knew what i was getting before ordering. Device came rooted and with latest update installed. Does everything i need it to. One thing i didnt expect was the short battery life, however after tweaking i was able to extend it for a couple days.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: It was pretty cool, but my sisters both have tablets w/ cameras to video chat. This one does not, so I sold that one and ordered the superpad. Everything worked fine though, youtube videos were extremly clear. It just didnt meet my needs. If it had a camera I would have gave it 5stars.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: Good product. It does the job! I bought it specially for reading my PDF and CHM computer's books and for watching video. The battery life is correct. The protective case is very useful and the HDMI video output is very nice. I'm satisfied.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review:
Pros: Nothing
Cons: Everything
I purchased this back when I was stupid about tablets and thought that this would be cool to have. I was wrong way way way wrong. This is the biggest piece of trash technology. I actually took it back within two days of purchase. Thank goodness for K-Marts full refund policy or I would have been out $180 bucks. Anyway please do yourself a favor and stay far far far away from this god awful product. Anyone who is giving this thing a good review either is trying to make themselves feel better about wasting there money or they work for the coby company. Just be warned.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review:
Pros: Small and lightweight; Economical compared to an iPad; all in one; Works well with 3D apps; fashion, convenient to operate
Cons: Touchscreen sometimes not responsive
I got a Coby Kyros 7015 Tablet Pc as a Christmas present and I have to say it's not bad at all. It's compact, and easy to use, has lots of features including an e-book reader, has hdmi output, has mini SD card slot so I can have storage that I would need for the for all the ebooks I want to get, and lots of other great features. I got a Wifi signal right away and didn't have to do much to set it up. The only drawback is that when I got on the internet and tried to use the touchscreen to scroll the page down, I was having quite a bit of trouble. It scrolled easily throught the apps pages, but not through th ... e web pages. I tried with both the pen and my finger and had trouble. I'm going to search to see if there's a mouse that can be used with the tablet so that my navigation can be a bit easier. I was also a bit discouraged that the internet access is only b/g and not n so I can't use it at home with my Netgear router. So I just use the tablet through a wifi signal when I'm on the go. I loved that it came with its own case so I wouldn't have to be bothered with having to go shopping for one. I liked this better than the netbook I was going to purchase after the holidays because it is much smaller and compact and I can hide it in my purse. I thought of getting an iphone or ipad, but I think I will be sticking with this because there seems to be a newer version of the iPhone and iPad coming out every year (lol) and I think it would be a waste of time and money for me. And now that I just found that the Coby Kyros is on sale again for $137 (at Walmart.com) I'll be getting one for my daughter. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: I was not very pleased with this item. Although it runs on Android, it does not access the same Apps as my Android phone. The apps available are very limited and some do not run at all. the speaker is very weak and the headphones are definetly needed if you want to hear audio on some websites. A simple app like angry birds take forever to load. The web browser is fair. The function keys are poor. The home key does not take you home it just jumps back one screen which is frustrating. Over all not a good purchase.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: This is a nice tablet PC. After "rooting" the tablet, I have access to all of the Google Apps. Please do not think that you are getting an I-Pad. I went in knowing this, and I am not disappointed at all. Actually, I'm rather pleased with this little tablet. For the money, it is a very good buy. ...

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review:
Pros: Small and lightweight; Economical compared to an iPad
Cons: Not too many accessories available; Touchscreen sometimes not responsive
The Coby Kyros MID7015 Android Touchscreen Tablet PC is not match for the Apple iPad, it's much better and at a much lower price! The Coby Kyros MID7015 Android Touchscreen Tablet PC has a 7 inch surface to browse the Internet from. In addition, you can watch movies and photos or listen to music on it. What's even better is you can hook the Coby Kyros MID7015 Android Touchscreen Tablet PC to your HDTV using hdmi and surf the web on its screen. Imagine that, surfing the web on say a 60" HDTV! In addition the Coby Kyros MID7015 Android Touchscreen Tablet PC offers 2 special apps, a e-book app, Aldiko e-book, so you can download and read e-bo ... oks. In addition, it has AppsLib, similar to Apple's app store. It also you to view and install apps. Furthermore it has 4GB of memory built in, and it's expandable to 16GB through the SD slot. In addition, you can hook up a usb keyboard to it. Also, it comes with a rechargable battery. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: Coby Kyros Is No Apple Killer
Item.Review:
Cons: Not too many accessories available; Unreliable, poor response on touchscreen
The thing that everyone I know wants to get from the new tech goodies you read about is the famous tablet from Cupertino. Every other tablet device is measured against the one, and if the performance and design of the alternatives were even remotely akin to the top tablet, I think they would be a great buy. I don't want to pay an excessive price just for coolness. Unfortunately, the only thing this tablet really has going for it is a great price. I do like the accelerometer, I have to say, but unless you play games on the Kyros--as opposed to playing them on a "real" computer or, more likely, a console, the accelerometer really is not very useful. I wanted to upgrade the Kyros with a lot of the free a ... pps it is advertised as having available to it, but then when I went online to download them, it turned out they were free only for a trial period. In my opinion it is very misleading to call something free when you actually have to pay for it. expand » « collapse
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 2 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: My girlfirend's laptop has been slowly dying, so I bought her this tablet to replace the dinosaur. It is excellent for casual browsing (facebook, email, weather, youtube - wish it came with full flash though.) All in all it is a really solid product. Make sure you have a strong wireless signal though, for some reason both tablets I have purcashed (Cruz and Kyros) have had really weak wireless receivers. Still a good tablet. ...

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: This product is amazing! I had difficulties in the beginning, it kept crashing. After "rooting" the device, it's been working wonderfully. This device has pretty much replaced my netbook computer. You can actually plug a keyboard into it... with the use of a stand, I can "dock" it, plugging in a keyboard and using it like I would a regular computer. Finding apps for the device can be tricky, but google is your friend. This is a great buy for the price. ...

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: Don't think this will replace the iPad
Item.Review:
Pros: Small and lightweight
Cons: Unreliable, poor response on touchscreen
I bought this for my son for Christmas thinking it would be an affordable alternative to getting him an iPad (which I have). Boy was I wrong. First, it is not user friendly in any way. You can't get any apps to speak of. Which was my main reason for buying him the tablet. The touchscreen does not scroll well or respond as well as the iPad.
When you turn it off, it has to be reset with a little button on the back to turn it back on. I thought it was broken before I found the reset button. I have had to put in the home network wifi password several times because it keeps kicking it out.
On a positive note, once you get on the internet, it is not bad for surfing and looking at the web. It is ... a google search so easy to find anything you are looking for and it is lightweight and small enough to fit in a purse. But overall, I would not recommend this product. Save your money for an iPad or wait until they have improved some of the alternatives that are on the market. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review:
Got this for christmas. Works really well for the price. Touch screen very responsive for resistive . Video play back is nice, though the unit does not list the names of the videos. Speakers could be better but do in a pinch.
Main issue out of the box was appslib not connecting and 1 stuck pixel on the screen. Was able to browse the internet and download an alternate store so I could get some apps but appslib refused to work even when updated. Got one of these for the wife and the same issue with hers. Will contact Coby after the holidays to see if this can be resolved.
I would recommend this product to people who want a cheap web browser / media player, and would recommend it to anyone who has some knowledge of android (adding the official android market is not for the weak ... of heart). Just don't expect ipad quality, but then you don't get the inflated ipad price either. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: I received this you could not hear on speakers, very small, called company and wanted shipping and other money for replacement, I only had for one day. So I have sent back, customer service at Coby very rude

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: THE COBY KYROS MID7015 IS THE TABLET YOU WANT TO GET!!!
Item.Review: i simply love my little 7 inch coby kyros mid7015 tablet, i have aother 10 inch android tablet but i want this little one to carry for travel on plane and etc. it is a great tablet and the screen moves very fast and there are so many things you can do on this little tablet...netflix ,youtube all the thinkg you can do on your i phone etc..it fits easily into my carry on bag and i can entertain myself for long flights..got a little leather cover to protect now i am all set...just need somewhere to go!!!!

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: love this tablet when it arrived first thing i did was upgrade to ginger bread 2.3.1 then went to gb 2.3.3 so cool runs fast cheap give it 5 stars [...] good company to buy from

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: The only plus with this device is that it is small and light however this does not outway the fact that the unit is extremely slow and the touchscreen is jumpy all I can say is if your trying to save money because you can't afford the Apple IPAD, my suggestion is you save your money. The IPAD is hands down a superior product.
Item.HelpfulCount: 0 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: This tablet does everything I need!!
Item.Review: After breaking into the tablet frenzy with a Cruz reader by Velocity, the Kyros was a very welcome step-up for me. I wanted something with a little more oomph than just a reader. The Kyros accomplishes just that. The speed is perfect for me. It plays videos flawlessly, which, by the way, the Cruz would not. All of the android apps that I have tried on the Kyros have worked very well. The wifi is very good and holds a connection much better than the Cruz. And guess what? I can still read books to my heart's delight. Of course, it doesn't have all the bells and whistles that more expensive tablets possess, but, for my purposes, it does absolutely everything I need it to do. The best part is that I paid only a few dollars more for the Kyros than I did for the Cruz reader. So if you are loo ... king for a good alternative to the more expensive tablets on the market, might I suggest this product by Coby. I do not think you will be disappointed. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: I bought 2 of these for my kids for the summer road trips. The touch screen is not like an iphone or droid, it is pressure sensitive and a little less responsive, however it is accurate and responsive using fingers and we had no need to use the stylus. The kids (7 & 4) can navigate the menus, choose movies, or games and entertain themselves. There are a lot of games and apps via the android appslib which we preloaded for them to use. All in all, perfect for what we were looking for.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: A local middle school recently supplied IPads to all of its students. That's great- but not too many schools are in a position to do that. One Laptop per Child has tried to supply affordable netbook computers to kids in under developed countries. I really admire that ambition.With the advent of a tablet like the Coby Kyros, there may be a new approach for schools. A school could set up several WiFi hotspots on campus, and request that students supply their own tablet. The Kyros is a great, affordable option- costing about the same as a Kindle Reader or a TI 84. I have found some excellent educational apps for just such a purpose. For starters, get the [...]AppStore App so that you can install a Kindle App. You can install MathPac+, a powerful, but pricey app which mimics the TI 84. I also ... like the Droid48 app from AppsLib, a free app which emulates to old HP48 perfectly.For fun, I love TuneIn Radio, Scanner, Movie Vault, and Maps. This rugged, portable, internet tablet is really versatile. And, one can use it independent of a computer. You can hook up a USB keyboard as I have done to prepare this review.This is a gem of an educational entertainment center. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: Touch screen (resistive) works great. I'm able to surf the web, download books, apps. Everything works just as it should. I didn't care too much for the case but it is functional. Thanks.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: I didn't expect it to be as useful as it is. The MP3 player is superb, surfing is fast and easily accessible. One down side is the I'm not quite sure how to work with the touch screen, it seems to either move too slowly or too quickly. Might have operator trouble. Another downside is that the Android version can't be updated to include the use of Adobe. I should have researched that further before purchase. It is a good toy and tool for the money. I haven't rooted it yet, that may make access to adobe available. I would buy it again. ...

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: I am sorry guy's but from what I read it was enough for me to cancel a $600 order on this tablet and I glad, I heard it crashes alot and it requires some work to get it going and guy 's I need some thing that's user friendly OK so I went with a better tablet the Item # Product Name Shipping Quantity Total Price 13309801 Archos 501582 8GB Internet Tablet Ground 2 $xxxxxx. This is a tablet you don't have to fight with and it looks good as well. Thank's Von C.xxxxx Houston,Texas ...

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: This Tablet is a large version of the SAMSUNG "Moment" cell phone. If you are familiar with that phone you will know exactly how to use this Tablet. In fact some of the applications say NOT compatible with this PHONE. Its like they took the phone software and put it into a Tablet. Im glad I didnt have to learn new software/operating system. I read in other comments you can attach a keyboard however, it must be a keyboard with a special adapter because this Tablet does not have a USB plug like the computers use. Over all I am glad I bought this because there are some games my kids & I play on my phone that can now be played on the larger screen and I can save the life of my cell phones battery. The post-it notes & Calendar applications will come in handy. So, I guess I will b ... e using it like an electronic Day planner that I can play games on and access the internet. Speaking of the Internet this Tablet uses the internet in Mobile version so, you will not be able to access your e-mail and full websites like you would using a computer. If I paid more for this I would return it but since I paid what I paid I am keeping it. ... expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything for an affordable tablet.
Cons: Nothing for an affordable tablet.
I bought the Coby Kyros a week ago and could not stop exloring the infinite possibilities that this little piece of technology offers. Congratulations to Coby for delivering a reliable (so far) and beautiful small tablet. I must highlight that this equipment will not compare to an Ipad, Motorola, Galaxy, or any other expensive tablet. However, it offers a lot of applications such as Email (hotmail, yahoo), Google browser, Google maps, games, Office (Word, Powerpoint, Excel), Adobe PDF, music, video, etc. It does not support Flash (it is an android 2.1), but you still can watch a lot of videos from Youtube. It cannot connect to Android Market (unless you root it), but honestly, all the important ... applications can be found over the web and AppsLibs (already intalled). It is very well manufactured, light, nice looking, and it has the right size for reading eBooks and taking with you anywhere (it comes with a nice leather case). It has WiFi but not 3G, it does not have a camera or GPS. Coby will launch more advanced Kyros(s) soon (check the website). Meanwhile, if you want an affordable, useful, and very nice tablet, try the Coby Kyros MID7015. It is very good. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: I purchased the Kryos to determine if a tablet is a format I could make use of and for [$] it served that purpose well. The Kryos is a good intro tablet if you're not sure you want to spend $600 or more on another brand. It has most of the basics (wifi, email, browser) but lacks Flash support and can't access the Android Marketplace (it has it's own appslib system which includes apps that don't all work with the Kryos)

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: Coby Kyros: know what you're paying for
Item.Review:
My husband and I purchased this tablet PC in the hopes of it serving as a PDA; keeping track of his calendar, contacts, and also being able to connect to the internet to make phone calls and keep him up to date on his e-mails.
We loved the screen; but be aware it is not the touchscreen like an iPod or other apple product; it is designed to be used with your fingernail or a stylus.
We appreciated the ability to customize the "desktop" and he was able to make phone calls on it, listen to mp3s, and add to the data storage by using a memory card.
But we had a beast of a time managing his calendar. The only way to do it effectively, and be able to sync with his Google calendar, was with an expensive app ($30) and wasn't great. We ended up returning it and purchasing an iPod ... Touch 4th Gen instead. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: I got this tablet to keep my child busy while in the car and on trips. You can put what Apps you want on it for the child to use. It has wireless capability and easy for her to use. The only thing I wish it had were a camera.
Item.HelpfulCount: 0 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: Great if you dont want to pay for an Ipad
Item.Review: I have an android phone so this is basically a bigger version of my phone except you can't place calls. Would be great if it had more apps. You ned WI-FI connection for the internet but it does comes with a USB cord which has a male end so you could hook up a wireless adapter like those from cricket, sprint, clear etc. It does what I need it to do. ...

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: I am okay with my purchase. The only weak point is the speaker system could be better, but it serves the purpose and I think my wife is very satisfied with it. So my hat goes off to the coby tablet. And I can say that technology is great.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: Don't waste your time ordering this piece of junk. I love electronic gadgets but this one made me hate gadgets. It actually made me cry, I was so disappointed. It's on it's way back to where it came from.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review:
Pros: Small and lightweight; Economical compared to an iPad; all in one; Works well with 3D apps
Cons: Not too many accessories available
I bought this for myself after Christmas. I was a little nervous about it since it had some bad reviews. I also know that people sometimes don't give products a fair shot and some are just technologically challenged. I updated AppsLib and found some other app stores .Google apps does not work with this so you have to search some of the other app sores SlideMe ,App Store, The book reader on here is okay if you only want free books, But I managed to download Kindle (Amazon ) and nook Barnes and Noble . It finds WI Fi connections easily, Internet is not as quick as my computer but is is great for killing time in Dr. offices and waiting for ... kids lessons etc. If you can't get an internet connection you can play games., or read books .I carry it in my purse all the time , the case protects it well . It can be uncomfotable to hold with the case but comes out fairly easily. The screen is fairly receptive. I use my nails on it usually but the stylus is also handy ! It is not an ipad but it also is not nearly the price . For the price of a book reader you can have the whole shot ,books email internet, you tube , and you can hook it up to your TV and watch movies from it .. I haven't found anything that I really don't Like about it . Holds a charge pretty well , I guess about 7 hours give or take . expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: Don't Judge a Book By It's Cover
Item.Review: Tried for five days to download one app. Still was not successful. Called the company for assistance, it has been four days and no one has returned my call. This was not the product for me.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: This tablet is great.I use it on the go a lot.It's small,light,and has good download speed. I would highly recommend it for anyone wanting a way to access the internet on the go.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: Throw in the trash - Not worth it
Item.Review:
Cons: Unreliable, poor response on touchscreen; Doesn't have very much memory; Lousy App Availabilty
This is one of the crappy tablet I have ever seen. Few my friends already warned me about the brand but I ignored them and bought this one. I knew that I was taking a chance in purchasing this product, as I had read the "so-so" reviews of others. Nevertheless, I decided to make the purchase. First of all it comes with Android 2.1 OS which itself is slow and buggy version from Google. There is no way to upgrade to 2.2 or honeycomb. Applib is complete disaster it did not work for me until few reboots. Always hangs in between. The first step in the process asks which device you are using and not a single Coby product is listed, and yes, this was after installing the update. I tried in ... vain for 45 minutes to get it to work in any way possible. It did not. Using a simple app like Google Maps is so bad that it becomes unusable when you want to find things on the map thanks to the touch screen inferiority.
To even turn on the device I had to reset multiple times. Coby's so-called technical support is actually an off-site phone call center, one that didn't even have an option for help with their tablet, nor an option to be put through to a human being. Coby's return policy is a rip-off. Not only do they require the customer to pay postage , but they also require a $15 mail order payable to them.
Totally Rip off! Hardware is so lower quality. Don't buy it otherwise you will end up returning it with pain. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: I dont know if the one i purchased was defective, but pages took ages to load if they loaded at all-and this was straight out of the box. Touch screen was not responsive at all.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review:
Pros: Small and lightweight; Economical compared to an iPad; all in one; Works well with 3D apps
The Coby Kyros MID7015 Android tablet PC is a great little computer. It is small so you can easily travel and carry it with you anywhere you need to go. I use mine for all of my work related business when I am out in the field, It works wonderful for what I need it for.The only drawback is it does'nt have a lot of memory so you are unable to store too much information in it. I usually have to upload my work information to my desktop on a regular basis. Other than that it has been a wonderful tool for me to use in my every day business.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: I believe it is a good phone, I love it, I am always on the internet and online, not neccesarily texting or chatting. I am one of those coupon printers and also a free sample go getter!!! I am always looking for deals.... I don't mind the touchscreen either it is very cool for this day and age!!!!!! Don't forget about the way it fits in your pockets. I also like the pricing of it, less expensive than I thought it would be.. I don't know what I would do without mine! My husband does not like them because they are bad with the whole touchscreen thing, he does not like any phone or anything that is touchscreen. He also does not like it because of the screen always getting scratched you know?! You always have to purchase covers which are not that expensive but the always peel off right when yo ... u need them I hate that too, I would recommend it to others, he would not so take this how you want it. Everyone thinks diff. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: The Coby fits in beautifully with my DroidX, we love it.
Item.Review:
Pros: Small and lightweight; Economical compared to an iPad; all in one
This tablet is soooo easy to use and the size of the screen is perfect for everything we use it for from reading our ebooks to using it to watch movies on all our TV's, we even take it to the bedroom to finish answer some of our late nite e-mails that we receive from friends & family. Theres so many things you can do with the Coby tablet we are still learning but it has already made life enjoyable and fun.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: Not bad as a temporary disposable tablet
Item.Review: I got this to use as a traveling Internet connection for when I didn't want to carry my primary computer. It is satisfactory for occasional short term use, but does have severe limitations. It is fairly slow to start up and acquire a WiFi connection. The touch screen is OK except when their is ambiguity in what you might want to do, like scroll the screen or move the contents of the screen. I also found the device had a hard time trying to load Android apps, to the point I ended up just using what it came with. I will still use it some while traveling, but will almost certainly replace it before the end of the year.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: Not worth the money - though cheap, it does little to nothing
Item.Review:
Pros: Economical compared to an iPad
Cons: Touchscreen sometimes not responsive; Unreliable, poor response on touchscreen; Doesn't have very much memory; Lousy App Availabilty
If you are looking for a replacemant for an ipad, this is NOT it. This tablet PC is very inexpensive and shows in its capability. Problem number one: the Android operating system on this tablet is not optimized for tablets, but for phones - wait until Android 3.0 Honeycomb comes out as it is made for tablets. Problem number two: this device has a resistive, NOT capacitive touch screen - all the neat stuff you can do on an ipad is impossible on this screen, resistive sreens do not have nearly the accuracy and ability of capacitive touch screens. Problem number 3: Apps - this device does NOT have access ... to the Android Marketplace to get all of the awesome apps that make a tablet pc even desirable - it has its own app store that is quite lame in comparison. This device is has very little memory, but it does have the abilty for a mico SD card, which can improve the storage capacity. While cheap, don't expect a lot for this device; if you really want awesome apps and functionality, wait for more of these Android tablets to become available, as they will get better, or save up for an ipad. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: I love this Coby Kyros MID7015 Android Touchscreen Tablet PC!
Item.Review:
Pros: Small and lightweight; Economical compared to an iPad; all in one
I think that this electronic is amazing . I really like it because its touchscreen that just makes it so much better . The fact that its powerd by android too is so good . Thats probally just my oppinion because i love Android but its good ! I would buy this product because it looks light and stylish thats just what i like . It would be really really nice to surf the web , listin to music , read things and play games all on this nice light android touchscreen tablet PC . I mean this is wonderful who wouldnt want to be able to do all these things on an android touchscreen tablet PC instead of haveing to use a computer with a mouse keyborad and all that other unessiary stuff .

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review:
Pros: Small and lightweight; Works well with 3D apps
Cons: Doesn't have very much memory
I have been using the Coby Kyros MID7015 Android Touchscreen Tablet PC for about a week now and it's not bad, but there are a few things that a problematics
1) It does not have a whole lot of memory so you have to be sure to close your applications once you are done using them, otherwise it will only hold about 50 text messages total (including inbox and outbox).
2) It has a mild problem with freezing up every once in a while, and on the worst of days it will sometimes restart itself, which can get really annoying at times.
Despite these few set backs, there are quite a few great things that come along with this product
1) It is very small and light making it e ... xtremely convenient for the person who is continuously on the go.
2) It works fairly well with 3D applications including Angry Birds (which is my personal favorites).
3) It actually sells for pretty cheap compared to several of it's competitors
I would definitely recommend this product to many of my friends. expand » « collapse

Well,as little time as ive had this anroid touchscreen its amazing!All in one you can simply
find every thing you would like in this phone.I can search many Apps as pleased.IT can keep me very busy,
just surfing the web all day:).i can even work online!.Thats terrific.compare to other phones.I can honesly say that i rate this amazing touchscreen 100% thums up....
SO I TRULY CAN SAY THIS WONDERFUL TOUCHSCREEN IS ALL IN ONE...THANK YOU FOR YOUR TIME.

i love this thing it does it all i can watch movies fom the internet . And at the same time i can stop and just hang out and listin to music while on the sofa. Its a great imtem the anderiod 2.2 software is awsome the way it can play flash and just the apps alone make it well worth the buy i can't stop saying good things about this it is way cheaper than a IPAD to so thats a big plus.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: coby kyros mid7015 android touchscreen tablet pc
Item.Review:
Pros: Small and lightweight; Economical compared to an iPad
the coby kyros mid 7015 android touchscreen tablet pc is a product that demostrates what happens when you combine good technological features, that comes small and lightweight, and is economical. also, combine this with great apps and you have a superior product compared to an ipad.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: A decent alternative to the iPad
Item.Review:
Pros: Small and lightweight; Economical compared to an iPad
Cons: Touchscreen sometimes not responsive; Not too many accessories available
Bought a Kyros and I think they are pretty good for the money paid. I especially like the color LCD feature because besides surfing, I can read my favorite magazines while I wait in line, between classes, at a doctor's office, or anywhere else. It's a much cheaper alternative to an iPad, but it's definitely NOT an iPad substitute.
I did have a hard time finding a resoanbly-priced sleeve for it. However, found a small company that makes a pretty good sleeve for this unit and sells them for only $8.95 with free freight at www.nuvo-tek.com.
By the same token, if anyone knows of where I can buy a good cover (not a sleeve) that ... is not too expensive for the Nook Color, please let me know.
Thanks expand » « collapse
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: I bought 2 of these..hoping my 19 year old son would like it. I'm on a limited budget(liek most of us) and he wanted an I-Pad. I thought at this price I could get one for my daughter as well.....I was worried he wouldnt like it because it wasnt the brand he wanted....I told him just try it and ill send it back if he didnt like it.......I CANT pry it out of his hands now. He loves it and loves the free app's GREAT BUY so happy. I cnat wait to hear from my daughter.,..I sent it out yesterday to her....thanks Shop NBC .....great product...easy to use right out of box.....amazing graphics....I'm buyinf one for myself...3 of these for the price of 1 I-pad..great value

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.ReviewTitle: tablets are great, why get this then?
Item.Review: Save your money until you can afford a REAL tablet computer instead of wasting time with this one. 4GB of flash memory? WHAT? that's ridiculous when my music player has 16gb of memory and has wi-fi built in for much less! Have a great day!

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: Coby is not the best name in electronics, but i did not want to spend all that money on a i-pad. I must say i am very impressed with this tablet. it does everything i need it for, and does it flawlessly. I added a micro card for even better storage of all my photos. The accessories it comes with are well worth it. The only problem i found it WIFI can sometimes cut out, but it comes right back.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: We've been looking at different tablets, as an iPad seemed too expensive. Right out of the box, I knew this one was going back. We charged it, then after only about 30 minutes of use, it completely turned off. After charging for a couple of hours, the unit would not even turn on. We had to press the reset button. We downloaded one game for my daughter, and the slow and jerky movements of the screen confirmed our decision to send this back. Bad, bad, bad, and so disappointing.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: Saw this unit on sale in early December and bought it for my son as Christmas present. Didn't open it until Christmas Day, tablet didn't boot until I found the reset button on back. Tried using the browser but it froze several times before I can reach the intended site (MSN) and each time required a hard reset. The resistive screen is a far cry from the i-phone/Galaxy screens, if you're already using one of these phones you would hate the Coby screen. Decided to return it, Dell was very responsive in mailing me the return label. Hope to get my money back soon.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review:
I bought two of these for my kids for Christmas. Didn't take them out of the box (my bad) until Christmas morning. 1 didn't turn on period even after being charged all afternoon and the other the applib never worked.
Really upset with this purchase.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: I must say that I was very suprised with the quality of this product. I purchased 2 of them as Christmas gifts for my nieces. I was a little concerend at first because I wasn't familiar with the COBY brand. However I must say that upon recieving them I took one out of the box to play around with it and I was very impressed. The initial set up and ease of use is a breeze. I was online browsing the internet and downloading books and apps almost instantly. If you're familiar with the Android market there are tons of free apps you can download and the reader provides tons of free books as well! The video quality is great and you have everything you need right out of the box. I would deffinitely recommend purchasing a micro SD card however. Once you start playing with this thing you can use up ... the 4gb of memory pretty quick. I decided to purchase a 32 gig card for each and I think we'll be set for a while. I'd deffinitely reccomend this product! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB

Item.Review: Well worth the price. Well made and great screen resolution. Does everything I needed at a fraction of the price of other tablets.

Item.Review: This is a very nice and easy to use tablet, at an affordable price. With an android operating system, this unit is an excellent value.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: Sorry, folks, but a resistive touchscreen makes for a bad experience.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: It would be nice if the tablet could be online anywhere rather then just WIFI. Like broadband 2 go etc.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: I expected a more quick response from the touchscreen, although the device has permitted me to download some games and features I like.

Item.Item: COBY Kyros Internet Tablet MID7015 4 GB
Item.Review: I bought 2 of these for my boys and am returning both. They kept freezing up and had to be reset. It would not find the internet if you were not next to it.
